data.eml:eml: Macropsini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) of Thailand, with description of two new species and three new country records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Liyuan, Dietrich, Christopher H., Zhang, Yalin (2016): Macropsini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) of Thailand, with description of two new species and three new country records. Zootaxa 4168 (1): 187-194, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4168.1.11
